import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { singleMovie } from '../actions' import '../css/NavBar.css' import NavBar from './NavBar'; const InMovie = (props) => { const movieID = props.match.params.id const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(singleMovie(movieID)) },[]) const getSingle = useSelector((state) => state.singleMovie) console.log(getSingle) return (

{getSingle?.title}

{getSingle?.release_date}

{getSingle?.genres.map((gen) => { return( {gen.name}, ) })}
{getSingle?.vote_average}
Üye
Puanları

Özet

{getSingle?.overview}

Chris Columbus

Director

Chris Columbus

Director

Chris Columbus

Director

) } export default InMovie;
